response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the cheese tart into the oven. Now, the next step is to turn on the oven to heat the cheese tart.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the cheese tart out of the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the oven.
(5) Take the cheese tart out of the oven.
(6) Put the cheese tart into the oven.
(7) Toggle on the oven to heat the cheese tart.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Toggle on the oven to heat the cheese tart
    oven = registry(env, "oven_wuinhm_0")
    toggle_on(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
